entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is one of the four houses at Hogwarts, founded by Salazar Slytherin. It takes in students with pure-blood ancestry and great cunning.

entities.name: ravenclaw
entities.description: Ravenclaw is one of the four houses at Hogwarts, founded by Rowena Ravenclaw. It takes in students with intelligence and sharp minds.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is one of the four houses at Hogwarts, founded by Godric Gryffindor. It takes in students with brave deeds and boldness.

entities.name: hufflepuff
entities.description: Hufflepuff is one of the four houses at Hogwarts, founded by Helga Hufflepuff. It takes in students who are not part of any other house and treats them equally.
